sys_script_include.description: This Script Include is used as a utility to determine UI Action visibilities
sys_script_include.name: DLAUIActionUtil

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_376096_dla.DLAUIActionUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>This Script Include is used as a utility to determine UI Action visibilities</description><name>DLAUIActionUtil</name><script><![CDATA[/* global Class, x_376096_dla, gs, sn_ws */
/* eslint no-undef: "error" */
var DLAUIActionUtil = Class.create();
DLAUIActionUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.dlaUtil = new x_376096_dla.DLAUtil();
    },
	
	showPublicACLsUIActionVisible: function (current, parent, action, RP) {
		if (gs.hasRole('admin')) {
			if (parent) {
				return parent.getTableName() == 'x_376096_dla_leak_result';
			}
		}
		
		return false;
	},

    type: 'DLAUIActionUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-26 21:46:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>060447f6978ab9103c2d3f56f053afee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DLAUIActionUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Data Leak Analyser" source="x_376096_dla">7ab9de70978671103c2d3f56f053af17</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Data Leak Analyser">7ab9de70978671103c2d3f56f053af17</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_060447f6978ab9103c2d3f56f053afee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-29 09:08:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
